## Interview Schedule vs Questionnaire

+------------------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------+
| Aspect                             | Interview Schedule                | Questionnaire                     |
+------------------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------+
| Administration                     | By interviewer                    | Self-administered                 |
+------------------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------+
| Question Type                      | Open-ended                        | Mostly closed-ended               |
+------------------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------+
| Flexibility                        | High (probing possible)           | Low (fixed questions)             |
+------------------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------+

## PRA (Participatory Rural Appraisal) Techniques

1. **Mapping**: Village resource mapping
2. **Transect Walks**: Systematic walks across areas
3. **Seasonal Calendars**: Seasonal variations in activities
4. **Venn Diagrams**: Institutional relationships
5. **Matrix Ranking**: Prioritizing problems/solutions

## Principles of Good Questions

1. Clear and simple language
2. Specific and unambiguous
3. Neutral (no leading questions)
4. Single concept per question
5. Avoid double negatives
